title: Enhance Group Communication for Social Engagement Among Patients
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to facilitate group communication among my patients so that they can engage with each other, reducing feelings of isolation and promoting social interaction.

title: Activity Recommendations to Enhance Patient Engagement
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to suggest personalized activities for my patients so that I can help prevent their social isolation and encourage their physical and cognitive engagement.

title: Feedback System for Tailoring Social Activity Recommendations
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive feedback on the social activities recommended for my patients so that I can better support their emotional well-being and ensure they engage in activities that truly interest them.

title: Health Monitoring Integration
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to continuously track my patients' vital signs and receive real-time updates so that I can monitor their health status efficiently and intervene early when necessary.

title: Support for Social Engagement Activities for Isolated Patients
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to recommend and facilitate social engagement activities for my isolated patients so that I can help them stay connected and improve their emotional well-being.

title: Tailored Social Interaction Alerts for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive alerts about my patients' social interactions so that I can ensure they are engaged and not feeling isolated.
